comment-text: This movie is truly a lot of fun
Colourful, tongue-in-cheek fun, purpose-built for grown-up lovers of kitsch ’80s science-fiction. But the Marvel formula is starting to feel, well, a little too formulaic.
Guardians of the Galaxy,” starring Chris Pratt, is one of those interstellar westerns about a motley group of appealing baddies who rise to the occasion.
This an intense, fairly riveting story
